High School National Ogura Hundred Poets Karuta Championship

we need to watch out for Fujisaki,
from Shizuoka, and the local Zentokuji.

Should we use the same one we used against Hokuo?

It does not matter if I lose as long as the four of you win!
I will do whatever it takes to increase our chances of winning!

live broadcast from Omi Jingu in Shiga.

with everyone is eyes on you...

and he should be released tomorrow.

but now it is the other way around!
He is the reason you do not have time to practice!
She is still working hard, even though she joined the track team.
I am sure that you are working hard.
I hope to meet you in a match.

I will try to be home as soon as I can!

No, Dad should be back by noon.
I do not want to be left behind!
I want to make Class A!
Excuse me, please let me through!

I cannot wait to watch you.

Because your karuta is just like Master Wataya's.
